page.title: 16The Port of Shoreham
page.content: impounded water area and which is nearly 2 miles long.Wharves have been constructed on both sides of each section of the Port.The total length of wharfage is nearly 19000feet.The Port Authority controls about 7000ft. The port can accommodate vessels of 115.9metres in length,16.4m beam,and 6.7m draught.The port imports fuels, different building materials,wines and spirits,foods,peat and fertilizer and many other goods. Exports include scrap metal,cement, cereals,some vehicles,general,and other cargoes. Now,the Port Authority wants to make the harbour into a passenger port capable of competing with Newhaven. There are mixed attitudes about this idea,but when asked the majority of people liked the proposal saying that it would bring prosperity to the town.
